flawed_nl_solution:
Mark has 60% 12 sided dice, so 60/100 * 10 = <<60/100*10=50/3>>50/3 12 sided dice.
James has 75% 12 sided dice, so 75/100 * 8 = <<75/100*8=6>>6 12 sided dice.
They will need to purchase 14 dice - 50/3 dice - 6 dice = <<14-50/3-6=-26/3>>-26/3 dice.
#### -26/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 50/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
